sentences.english: A dual-executive is the central characteristic of semi-presidential systems.
sentences.chinese: 行政体系二元化是半总统制重要的特色之一。

sentences.english: "The most stable regimes in the world are democratic regimes," he said.
sentences.chinese: “世界上最稳定的政体是民主政体”，他又说。

sentences.english: "The most stable regimes in the world are democratic regimes," he said.
sentences.chinese: “世界上最稳定的政体是民主政体”，他又说。

sentences.english: Is there a single best regime?
sentences.chinese: 有哪一种政体是最好的吗？

sentences.english: Nobody would approve your ideal plans for reforming the system of government.
sentences.chinese: 人会赞成你的关于改革政体的不切的计划。

sentences.english: Modern-day democracies are kleptocracies in one way or another.
sentences.chinese: 现代民主政体在某种程度上都是盗贼政府。

sentences.english: It is structured and ordered into a few basic regime types.
sentences.chinese: 它是经建构与安排成数种基本政体类型。

sentences.english: Following his defeat in 1815, the French monarchy was re-established.
sentences.chinese: 1815年，随着他的胜利，法国君主政体再次建立。

sentences.english: The term "regime" is a familiar one.

sentences.chinese: 现在类似的神权政体甚至很难改掉。

sentences.english: Off-exchange transactions may be less regulated or subject to a separate regulatory regime.
sentences.chinese: 也许规范性较低或属于不同的政体。

sentences.english: A basic conflict between the ethos and system has weakened the Indian polity.
sentences.chinese: 一个之间的校风和系统的基本冲突削弱了印度的政体。

sentences.english: Medieval Christianity would itself,therefore, imitate the structures of monarchy and empire.
sentences.chinese: 因此中世纪基督教自己，模仿君主政体和帝国的结构。

sentences.english: New Governments, and wonders which give you free advances also help alot.
sentences.chinese: 新的政体，奇观也能给你的文明的发展带来很多好处。

sentences.english: But the virtue of xenophobia is never really extinguished in any multiethnic body politic.
sentences.chinese: 但是仇外的意识从未真正在任何多族裔政体中被清除。

sentences.english: Spinoza argued that the democratic system was the best of all the forms of government.
sentences.chinese: 斯宾诺莎认为，民主政体是最好的治理国家的方式。

definition: centralized power (history), e.g. under an Emperor or party
